descriptions: to manually connect the bot. (For example when returning from being AFK...)
to manually disconnect the bot. (Use if stuck)

to set the volume at which joinsounds are being played 
 Syntax : volume N, where N is between 0 and 100
to see the volume at which joinsounds are being played (Between 0% , 100%)

set the command COMMAND_ID to be NEW_COMMAND. 
(where COMMAND_ID is an Integer and NEW_COMMAND is the new alias)
-> Syntax: set COMMAND_ID NEW_COMMAND

to change the role the but listens to (for joining purposes)
-> Syntax: changeRole ROLE_MENTION
to see the role the bot listens to (for joining purposes).

to change the prefix.
-> Syntax: setPrefix PREFIX
to lock your current channel (Only one at the same time).
to open the currently locked channel.

to set the channel whose messages are being reacted and listened to by the bot. 
 Syntax: setChannel CHANNEL_MENTION

Adding Reactions to the already set Channel messages. 
  Syntax: addReaction [LIST OF REACTION_NAME]

to change the standart role that is given with every reaction role. 
 Syntax changeReactionRole ROLE_MENTION
to show the standart role that is given with every reaction role.
to become a VIP and get a custom joinsound. (You can also dm the bot "becomeVIP")
